mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.fullPath FROM board a LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT a.* FROM files a INNER JOIN ( SELECT board_id, MAX(fno) AS fno FROM files GROUP BY board_id) b ON a.fno = b.fno ) b ON a.board_id = b.board_id ORDER BY a.board_id DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

SELECT a.*, b.fullPath FROM board a LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT a.* FROM files a INNER JOIN ( SELECT board_id, MAX(fno) AS fno FROM files GROUP BY board_id) b ON a.fno = b.fno ) b ON a.board_id = b.board_id WHERE a.BOARD_ID = #{board_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( SUBJECT, CONTENT, WRITER, TELNO, LOCATION, KINDS, GENDER, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{subject}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{telNo}, #{location}, #{kinds}, #{gender}, now()
insert into board_reply( board_id, parent_id, depth, reply_content, reply_writer ) values ( #{board_id}, #{parent_id}, #{depth}, #{reply_content}, #{reply_writer} )
mapper.select: select reply_id, board_id, parent_id, depth, reply_content, reply_writer from board_reply where board_id = #{board_id} order by reply_id asc
mapper.delete: delete from board_reply where reply_id in ( select reply_id from (select reply_id from board_reply where reply_id = #{reply_id} ) or parent_id in ( select reply_id from (select reply_id from board_reply where reply_id = #{reply_id} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO files (board_id, fileName, fileOriName, filePath, fullPath) VALUES (#{board_id}, #{fileName}, #{fileOriName}, #{filePath}, #{fullPath} )
